theChemist:DragonsGift.NAME: Dragon's Gift
theChemist:DragonsGift.FLAVOR: Unwillingly parted with, but a gift nonetheless.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a #yDragon #yFang in your stockpile.

theChemist:ReinforcedFlask.NAME: Reinforced Flask
theChemist:ReinforcedFlask.FLAVOR: A stronger dose never hurt anyone.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with #yImbalance take #b75% more damage rather than #b50%.
